title: Riccitello Sees Pogačar as Cycling’s Ultimate Benchmark: ‘A Race with Him Is an Opportunity To Show How Good You Are’
content:
Talented US climber Riccitello is just 22 but is already taking some big WorldTour results. Sunday's summit finish at the UAE Tour is his next target.

Read the full article at Riccitello Sees Pogačar as Cycling’s Ultimate Benchmark: ‘A Race with Him Is an Opportunity To Show How Good You Are’ on Velo.
